title: Huni ... from NZ
content:
saw this in a publication I was flicking through recently and just kept looking at it ... love it

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130222141318im_/http:/typophile.com/files/huni-logo_4741.gif)

thought I'd share
author: Ratbaggy

comments.content: It's by the talented folks at [designworks.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130222141318/http:/www.designworks.co.nz/index.php?page=Huni_Skincare)

That really is a gorgeous concept - executed beautifully too.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130222141318im_/http:/typophile.com/files/huni_4286.jpg)
